languages.text: "Клянусь, я рассматривал вариант полной зачистки Простора — этот клубок угроз и скверн было проще сжечь, чем распутать. Но шпионская сеть, сотканная мной, принесла еще более радикальные и интересные решения. Расследуя связи Амарната, я пристальнее присмотрелся к Теодоре фон Валанциус, и она подарила мне Осколок".

"Frankly, I considered purging the entire Expanse: it would have been much easier to burn down this whole tangle of threats and corruption. But the web of spies that I had woven presented me with much more interesting and radical solutions. While investigating Amarnat's connections, I turned my eye to Theodora von Valancius, who ultimately gave me the Shard."
languages.original_text: "Клянусь, я рассматривал вариант полной зачистки Простора — этот клубок угроз и скверн было проще сжечь, чем распутать. Но шпионская сеть, сотканная мной, принесла еще более радикальные и интересные решения. Расследуя связи Амарната, я пристальнее присмотрелся к Теодоре фон Валанциус, и она подарила мне Осколок".

traits.locale_text: "I swear I thought about mopping up the entire Expanse — it would have been much simpler to just burn down the entire mass of threats and corruption. But the web of spies that i had webbed came to me with much more interesting and radical solutions. Investigating Amarnat's ties had led me to Theodora von Valancius who brought me a Shard."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

But the web of spies that i had webbed came to me with much more interesting and radical solutions. Investigating Amarnat's ties had led me to Theodora von Valancius who brought me a Shard."

But the web of spies that I had woven presented me with much more interesting and radical solutions. While investigating Amarnat's connections, I turned my eye to Theodora von Valancius, who ultimately gave me the Shard."

languages.text: « Franchement, j'ai envisagé de purger toutes les Étendues : il aurait été bien plus simple de réduire en cendres cet enchevêtrement de menaces et de corruption. Mais le réseau d'espions que j'avais mis en place m'a proposé des solutions bien plus intéressantes et radicales. En me penchant sur les relations d'Amarnat, je suis remonté jusqu'à Théodora von Valancius, qui m'a ensuite donné l'Écharde. »
languages.original_text: "Frankly, I considered purging the entire Expanse: it would have been much easier to burn down this whole tangle of threats and corruption. But the web of spies that I had woven presented me with much more interesting and radical solutions. While investigating Amarnat's connections, I turned my eye to Theodora von Valancius, who ultimately gave me the Shard."

traits.locale_text: « Franchement, j'ai envisagé de purger toutes les Étendues : il aurait été bien plus simple de réduire en cendres cet enchevêtrement de menaces et de corruption. Mais le réseau d'espions que j'avais mis en place m'a proposé des solutions bien plus intéressantes et radicales. En me penchant sur les relations d'Amarnat, je suis remonté jusqu'à Théodora von Valancius qui m'a donné une Écharde. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Para serle sincero, me planteé purgar la Extensión al completo; habría sido mucho más sencillo calcinar toda esta maraña de amenazas y corrupción. Sin embargo, la red de espías que había tejido me presentó soluciones mucho más interesantes y radicales. Mientras investigaba las conexiones de Amarnat, dirigí mi atención hacia Theodora von Valancius, que finalmente me llevó al fragmento».
languages.original_text: "Frankly, I considered purging the entire Expanse: it would have been much easier to burn down this whole tangle of threats and corruption. But the web of spies that I had woven presented me with much more interesting and radical solutions. While investigating Amarnat's connections, I turned my eye to Theodora von Valancius, who ultimately gave me the Shard."

traits.locale_text: «Le juro que pensé en purgar la Extensión al completo; habría sido mucho más fácil incinerar toda esa masa de amenazas y podredumbre, pero mi red de espías me sugería soluciones mucho más interesantes y radicales. Investigar los contactos de Amarnat me llevó hasta Theodora von Valancius, que fue quien me entregó el fragmento».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “老实说，我曾经打算直接净化整个科罗努斯扩区，直接一把火烧掉所有的腐化与威胁，这个方案要容易得多。不过，我的间谍网提出了更加有趣、更加激进的解决方案。在调查阿玛纳特关系网的过程中，我把目光转向了西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯，而我最终从她那里得到了这块碎片。”
languages.original_text: "Frankly, I considered purging the entire Expanse: it would have been much easier to burn down this whole tangle of threats and corruption. But the web of spies that I had woven presented me with much more interesting and radical solutions. While investigating Amarnat's connections, I turned my eye to Theodora von Valancius, who ultimately gave me the Shard."

traits.locale_text: “老实说，我曾经打算直接净化整个科罗努斯扩区，直接一把火烧掉所有的污秽与威胁，这个方案要容易得多。不过，我的间谍网提出了更加有趣、更加激进的解决方案。在调查阿玛纳特关系网的过程中，我遇到了西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯，而她给了我一块碎片。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Offen gestanden hatte ich überlegt, die gesamte Ausdehnung zu tilgen. Es wäre leichter gewesen, dieses ganze Gewirr aus Gefahren und Verderbnis niederzubrennen. Doch das Netz aus Spionen, das ich gewebt hatte, schlug sehr viel interessantere und radikalere Lösungen vor. Während ich Amarnats Verbindungen untersucht habe, habe ich Theodora von Valancius ins Visier genommen, die mir schließlich das Fragment gegeben hat."
languages.original_text: "Frankly, I considered purging the entire Expanse: it would have been much easier to burn down this whole tangle of threats and corruption. But the web of spies that I had woven presented me with much more interesting and radical solutions. While investigating Amarnat's connections, I turned my eye to Theodora von Valancius, who ultimately gave me the Shard."

traits.locale_text: "Ich schwöre, ich habe daran gedacht, die gesamte Ausdehnung wegzuwischen. Es wäre sehr viel leichter gewesen, einfach die ganze Masse an Gefahren und Schmutz niederzubrennen. Doch das Netz aus Spionen, das ich gewebt hatte, schlug sehr viel interessantere und radikalere Lösungen vor. Durch Recherchen zu Amarnats Verbindungen war ich auf Theodora von Valancius gestoßen, die mir ein Fragment gab."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「正直に言うと、私はエクスパンス全体を浄化することを考えたのだ。脅威と腐敗のこの混沌をまるごと焼き払うほうが、ずっと簡単だった。しかし、私が編み出したスパイ網は、はるかに興味深く、根本的な解決策を示唆した。アマルナトとのつながりを調査する一方で、シャードをもたらしたシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスに目を向けたのだ」
languages.original_text: "Frankly, I considered purging the entire Expanse: it would have been much easier to burn down this whole tangle of threats and corruption. But the web of spies that I had woven presented me with much more interesting and radical solutions. While investigating Amarnat's connections, I turned my eye to Theodora von Valancius, who ultimately gave me the Shard."

traits.locale_text: 「正直に言うと、私はエクスパンス全体を浄化することを考えたのだ。脅威と腐敗のこの混沌をまるごと焼き払うほうが、ずっと簡単だった。しかし、私が編み出したスパイ網は、はるかに興味深く、根本的な解決策を示唆した。アマルナトとのつながりを調査する一方で、シャードをもたらしたシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスに目を向けたのだ」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Açıkçası Enginlik'in tamamını temizlemeyi düşündüm. Bu tehdit düğümünü ve yozlaşmayı toptan yakmak çok daha kolay olurdu. Fakat yerleştirdiğim ajanlar bana çok daha ilginç ve radikal çözümler sundular. Amarnat'ın bağlantılarını incelerken dikkatimi Theodora von Valancius'a çevirdim, o da bana Parça'yı sundu."
languages.original_text: "Frankly, I considered purging the entire Expanse: it would have been much easier to burn down this whole tangle of threats and corruption. But the web of spies that I had woven presented me with much more interesting and radical solutions. While investigating Amarnat's connections, I turned my eye to Theodora von Valancius, who ultimately gave me the Shard."
